subject: Basketball
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Felton agreed to plead guilty to a felony gun possession charge in return for a $5,000 fine and 500 hours of community service, his lawyer, Jim Walden, said on Monday.
snippet: Felton agreed to plead guilty to a felony gun possession charge in return for a $5,000 fine and 500 hours of community service, his lawyer, Jim Walden, said on Monday.
